altTitles.en: ミレンボーイ・ミレンガール
ヤンキー少女とひねくれ男子
先見少年シンドローム
沈黙ガールのリトルクライ

description.en:
Mizuki Sora's first compilation of one-shots. Includes 5 short stories:

1. Chinmoku Girl no Little Cry (Silent Girl's Little Cry) Kohane is a high school student who has bad pronunciation since she was young. She refuses to talk since she's been teased by others because of her accent, and chooses not to, rather than being laughed at. One day, when Kohane was going to the teacher's lounge, she meets a senpai who had wounds from a fight and gives him bandages since there was no nurse in the office. Igarashi (the senpai) confesses to Kohane and helps out for her English pronunciation contest. The story is about Kohane accepting herself and finding someone who accepts herself with her awkward accent.

2. Senken Shounen Syndrome (Apprehensive Boy Syndrome)

3. Yankee Shoujo to Hinekure Danshi (Delinquent Girl and Contrary Boy)

4. Miren Boy Miren Girl (Lingering Boy, Lingering Girl)

5. Tsuiraku JK to Haijin Kyoushi Bangaihen
description.pt-br:
Primeira compilação de one-shots da Mizuki Sora's. Inclusas 5 one-shots

1. Chinmoku Girl no Little Cry (Silent Girl's Little Cry) Kohane é uma estudante do ensino médio que tem uma má pronunciação desde que era nova. Ela se recusa a falar desde que foi provocada por outros por causa de seu sotaque e prefere não falar do que ser ridicularizada. Um dia, quando Kohane estava indo a sala dos professores, ela conhece um senpai que estava com ferimentos de uma briga e lhe dá ataduras, já que não havia ninguém na enfermaria. A história é sobre Kohane aceitando a si mesma e encontrando alguém que a aceita mesmo com seu sotaque estranho.


2. Senken Shounen Syndrome (Apprehensive Boy Syndrome)

3. Yankee Shoujo to Hinekure Danshi (Delinquent Girl and Contrary Boy)

4. Miren Boy Miren Girl (Lingering Boy, Lingering Girl)

5. Tsuiraku JK to Haijin Kyoushi Bangaihen
